title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 445.1 - Inland navigation rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 445.1 - Inland navigation rules

State Regulations

The Inland Navigation Rules of the United States Coast

Guard, Department of Homeland Security at 33 Code of Federal Regulations (CFR)
parts 83-88 and 90 are adopted and incorporated by reference in this Part and
apply to vessels on the navigable waters of New York State and on the
tidewaters bordering on or lying within the boundaries of Nassau and Suffolk
counties. 33 CFR part
83
is published at, https://www.ecfr.gov/current/title-33/chapter-I/subchapter-E/part-83?toc=1. And, 33 CFR
parts
84-88 and
90 are published at
https://www.ecfr.gov/current/title-33/chapter-I/subchapter-E, and by the National Archives and Records Administration. These Federal
regulations are also available for inspection and copying from the Office of

Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation, Bureau of Marine Services, 625

Broadway, Albany, NY 12233, https://parks.ny.gov/recreation/boating/; and from the New York Department of State, One Commerce Plaza, 99 Washington

Avenue, Albany, NY 12231-0001. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
445.1

Amended

New

York State Register March 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 10, eff. 3/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
